name: Concept24
description: Concept24 is a web development company based in Romania, with over 10 years of experience in Europe, USA and Canada. Our mission is to increase your business using advanced and custom solutions. We strongly believe in the power of custom web development. In a market where the number of “out of the box solutions” is exploding, only companies that are able to address the customers and to organize their business in a unique and personalized way are making profits.
